pull.title: GUI: Enable changing the autoprune block space size in intro dialog

events.body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
No conflicts as of last run.

events.message: GUI/Intro: Return actual prune setting from showIfNeeded
GUI/Intro: Rework UI flow to let the user set prune size in GBs
GUI/Intro: Estimate max age of backups that can be restored with pruning

events.body: Given this hasn't received any review/discussion in the 5 months since opening, and is entirely in GUI code, let's move this PR over to the [GUI repo](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui).
